function renderLine(line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
if c == "o" then oxyd(i-1,line) elseif c == "I" then d = d + 1 set_stone ("st-door-v",i-1,line,{name="tor"..tostring(d)}) elseif c == "i" then t = t + 1 set_item ("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="openclose",target="tor"..tostring(t)}) elseif c == "+" then set_stone ("st-camouflage",i-1,line) elseif c == "s" then set_stone ("st-rock1_move",i-1,line) elseif c == "w" then set_stone ("st-wood",i-1,line) elseif c == "=" then set_floor ("fl-water",i-1,line) elseif c == "." then set_stone ("st-stoneimpulse",i-1,line) elseif c == "b" then set_stone ("st-block",i-1,line) elseif c == "h" then set_stone ("st-brownie",i-1,line) elseif c == "B" then set_floor ("fl-swamp",i-1,line,{friction=4.0,mousefactor=1.5}) elseif c == "c" then set_stone ("st-chess_black",i-1,line) elseif c == "C" then set_stone ("st-chess_white",i-1,line) elseif c == "l" then set_stone ("st-lightpassenger",i-1,line) elseif c == "L" then set_stone ("st-laser-s",i-1,line,{name="lass"}) elseif c == "M" then set_stone ("st-laser-w",i-1,line,{name="lasw"}) elseif c == "p" then set_stone ("st-pull",i-1,line) elseif c == "r" then set_stone ("st-rotator_move-right",i-1,line) elseif c == "R" then set_item ("it-wrench",i-1,line) elseif c == "f" then set_stone ("st-floppy",i-1,line,{on=0,action="onoff",target="lasw"}) elseif c == "g" then set_stone ("st-floppy",i-1,line,{on=0,action="onoff",target="lass"}) elseif c == "G" then set_stone ("st-rock1_move",i-1,line) set_item ("it-floppy",i-1,line) elseif c == "1" then set_floor ("fl-leavesb",i-1,line) elseif c == "2" then set_floor ("fl-leavese2",i-1,line) end end end
create_world (20,13) fill_floor("fl-leaves",0,0,20,13) oxyd_default_flavor = "d"
